alert.note: Alert for Cross (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 4:52PM CDT until May 27 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cross County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 452 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Parkin, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wynne, Parkin, Village Creek State Park, McDonald, Smithdale, Kinton, River Front, Fitzgerald Crossing, Levesque, Wittsburg, Princedale and Duvall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
